body: While your appearance and abilities might seem comical to others, they can be deadly to your foes. 1st-Tier Path Abilities—clown, combat trickery, improbable prestidigitation, no one of consequence; 3rd-Tier Abilities—combat saboteur, menacing whisper, perfect mimic, sardonic wit; 6th-Tier Abilities—class mimic.
